root.name: Star Trek: The Video Game
root.description: OverviewStar Trek is a sci-fi third-person shooter developed by Digital Extremes and published by both Namco Bandai and Paramount for the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, and PC on April 23, 2013. Set in the Star Trek universe, after the events of the 2009 film of the same name (but before the events of the 2013 film Star Trek Into Darkness), the co-operative based shooter has players controlling either the action hero Cpt. Kirk or the stealthy Cmdr. Spock, as they investigate attacks on the New Vulcan colony by the Gorn.ENEMIESFederation EnemiesInfected VulcanFederation OfficerGorn EnemiesGorn InitiateGorn Enforcer???Gorn RusherGorn ObserverGorn ScoutGorn Warrior???Gorpion???Gorn Advanced EnemiesGorn Brute???Gorn SecurityGorn TurretAttack Drone??????Defense DroneWeaponsFederation WeaponsVulcan Pulse CannonStun GrenadeStarfleet Phaser RifleStarfleet Type III Rifle??????Gorn WeaponsGorn RavagerPlasma GrenadeGorn MarauderGorn RailerGorn StrikerGorn Pillager???PC System RequirementsMinimumOS:Windows XP SP2Processor:Intel Core 2 @ 2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+Memory:2 GB RAMGraphics:Nvidia Geforce 9600/ ATI Radeon HD 2900 GFX RAM: 512 MBDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:8 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX CompatibleOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connectionRecommendedOS:Windows Vista or higherProcessor:2.4 GHz quad core or higherMemory:4 GB RAMGraphics:Nvidia GeforceGTX 560/ATI Radeon HD 5850 or better GFX RAM: 1GB or moreDirectX®:9.0cHard Drive:8 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX CompatibleOther Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
